nodes.text: The AT-ST Mark III, also known as the Veteran AT-ST, was an All Terrain Scout Transport variant used by the Imperial Army during the Galactic Civil War. Due to its experimental armor, it was both faster and more durable than a standard AT-ST. It was painted in a dark color scheme, and at times a gray color scheme. It was fitted with twin rotating heavy laser cannons and was piloted by a veteran crew and excelled against most targets. A cold weather variant also existed.
The AT-ST Mark III was originally created for Star Wars: Commander, a mobile strategy game developed by Disney Interactive and released on August 21, 2014 for iOS devices.
